file_content.text: You okay over there?
I think... my time's finally come...
[Lie] I'm dying.
Get the blast door open.
Open the door.
Nothing we couldn't handle. You?
Fine. How's everyone else?
We're all good here.
Tried to open the blast door, no luck. Maybe SCORPIO can take a crack at it.
I am not presently in a position to override the captain's controls.
Had to sting to admit that.
So she's better than you? Ouch!
Map a route for us to meet up.
Find us a detour.
Have Senya and Lana focus on the door. Between the three of us, we'll open it.
We'll use the Force.
Some kind of gas venting in! We have to keep moving!
I've sent coordinates to a suitable meeting place.
You survived my initial assault. But there's nowhere my Skytroopers cannot find and extinguish you.
You already know how this is going to end. Get it over with--face us now.
Come out of hiding.
We won't be hiding. We're coming right for you, and we're going to dismantle every last circuit.
I can't wait to destroy you.
This is what it's like to listen to you, in case you were wondering.
Irritating, isn't it, SCORPIO?
I almost feel like I should apologize.
She'll adapt now. Expect her next move to be even less direct.
She's based off your design. Can't you predict what she'll do?
Quiet.
She wants to see what we can do. I suggest we oblige her.
Already tried, couldn't slice it. SCORPIO, think you could give it a shot?
Wow. Good thing you're no stage performer.
Odd time for an attempt at levity.
Yes, I have it. Transmitting.
Got it. We're on our way.
Do not think victory won't be mine in the end.
Mask your unease with confidence if you wish. I understand it's what people do when they're faced with mortality.
This is all awfully familiar.
Remind you of anyone?
If you're referring to Megasecurity Ward Twenty-Three... I may owe you an apology.
Intimidation will not work on me, but thank you for relaying your plan.
I just did. I predict she'll be unpredictable.
Last I checked, more than one of you had lightsabers. Start cutting.
Use your lightsabers!
